task:
Perform cell type annotation on this mouse brain dataset. Attached are the per-sample Wilcoxon ranked gene results. First, identify all brain cell types present in the data. After generating your annotations, map each label to the following vocabulary when possible. If a label does not match any term below, retain its original name from your annotation.

Vocabulary:
- germ line stem cell
- germ cell
- primordial germ cell
- germline-derived nurse cell
- cementoblast
- Neuron
- exocrine cell
- protein secreting cell
- surfactant secreting cell
- seromucus secreting cell
- endocrine cell
- peptide hormone secreting cell
- steroid hormone secreting cell
- testosterone secreting cell
- hatching gland cell
- milk secreting cell
- alkali secreting cell
- vaginal lubricant secreting cell
- luteinizing hormone secreting cell
- carbohydrate secreting cell
- biogenic amine secreting cell
- juvenile hormone secreting cell
- oenocyte
- neuromast mantle cell
- alarm substance cell
- cnidocyte
- hypocretin-secreting neuron

- secretory epithelial cell
- valve interstitial cell

- adventitial fibroblast

- OEC NN_1 Rasgef1c olfactory ensheathing cell (Mmus)

<EVAL_ANSWER>

}

scoring.set_definition: Compare the SET of predicted labels against the ground_truth_labels.
scoring.description: Jaccard â‰¥ 0.90 required to pass; equivalent to identifying all six correct major categories while avoiding extras.
